parameters.name: MEMORY_LIMIT_MAX
parameters.description: Maximum amount of memory a deployed container can use.

parameters.name: MEMORY_LIMIT_MIN
parameters.description: Requested amount of memory a deployed container should get.

parameters.name: JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS
parameters.displayName: The JVM arguments to pass to java
parameters.description: Set this to the desired JVM flags to be added in the deployed containers.

parameters.name: SECRET
parameters.displayName: The push/pull secret for the images
parameters.description: The push/pull secret for the images
